r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for any markup as Wiki or BBCode in structured plain text.
r.d: The text transformation is done in 2 steps, the parsers use rules to tokenize the content, renderers ouput the tokens and left text in the requested format. Used for versatile transformers as well as converters.
r.n: This is a bug fix release, the Bug #5863: mixed <ul> <ol> when using * and # fix introduced a potential BBC: Bug #5879 Nested lists to do not parse properly in Text_Wiki
